content: the picture below the final step for making this cow is to shape the head this step is optional but recommended as i think it makes it look extra cute shaping the head involves making the eyes more sunken in to give shape to the face with a long piece of poke the needle through insert the darning yarn insert the needle the other side of the head needle through the left through the back of on the right hand side of side of the right eye the head the right eye assembly next poke the darning poke the darning needle now poke the darning needle through to the over the eye to the left needle out the way you right side of the left side of the left eye came through on the eye and pull through back of the head there should be yarn pull the yarn tightly this is roughly what the over the eyes now tuck enough to see the indents should look like the yarn over the top of indents in the head on from a top view the eye and pull the both eyes yarn to hide it once you re happy with how it looks knot and fasten_off the tail of the yarn at the back of the head weave in any tail ends and you re done finished product you have now finished the crochet cow if you had any trouble following the shaping of the head on the last page there are plenty of video tutorials on youtube tiktok etc just search up how to shape amigurmui head and you ll find plenty of in depth tutorials if you need instructions in video form thank you for using this pattern and i would love to see any finished products you make
